title: CHART Presidential vote in elections evidence

content.question: The data in the table provide clear evidence that

choices.label: Republicans were increasingly likely to defect from their partyâ€™s candidate

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
